meanings.definition: Of or relating to a sound produced with simultaneous velar and labial articulation.
meanings.sent1: The labiovelar pronunciation was a unique blend of lip and throat movements.
meanings.sent2: She studied the labiovelar sounds in phonetics class.
meanings.sent3: The labiovelar accent made the audience giggle during the play.
meanings.sent4: His labiovelar singing voice was a harmonious mix of deep and soft tones.
meanings.sent5: The labiovelar articulation was so clear, it echoed in the room.

meanings.sent1: The language had a distinct labiovelar in its alphabet.
meanings.sent2: He struggled to pronounce the labiovelar correctly.
meanings.sent3: The labiovelar in the song added a fun twist to the melody.
meanings.sent4: The labiovelar echoed through the valley, creating a mysterious atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: Learning to produce the labiovelar was a challenge, but she mastered it eventually.
